Bailey Baker sent the following message at 4:36 PM
View Bailey‚Äôs profileBailey Baker
Bailey Baker (She/Her) 4:36 PM
Hi Dr. Pegues,

I was looking at your profile and, based on your experience, I would like to talk to you about some of the exciting counseling and psychiatric work we have at Televero Health.

What do you think about scheduling a quick call to discuss this? Is there a time that works best for you?
Ashle Pegues sent the following messages at 4:36 PM
View Ashle‚Äôs profileAshle Pegues
Ashle Pegues (She/Her) 4:36 PM
Good morning, Bailey!

Thank you for taking the time to reach out and connect. Yes, I would be interested in learning more about opportunities at Televero Health.

I am available this afternoon at 3pm CST. I do understand that this is short notice, so I am also available Tuesday. March 21st, 12pm- 2pm CST. Please let me know if either of these times works for you.

Hi Ashle,

Thank you for sharing your profile with me. Based on your background and experience, I believe you have a strong foundation in healthcare and a passion for helping others. However, I am unable to confirm if you are qualified for LCSW or psychiatry work, as I couldn't find information related to those specific qualifications on your profile.

At Televero Health, we have some exciting counseling and psychiatric work opportunities. If you have the required qualifications or know someone in your network who might be interested, we would greatly appreciate a referral. Please let me know if you or someone you know would be open to a quick call to discuss these opportunities further.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,
Bailey
